channel.title: Help on ShowyEdge
channel.description: Recent content in Help on ShowyEdge

item.title: How to quit ShowyEdge
item.description: ShowyEdge keeps running in the background even if you close the preferences window. To quit ShowyEdge, choose “Quit ShowyEdge” from menu bar. Note If you’ve hidden the menu bar icon, you can also quit ShowyEdge from Preferences. Open preferences window. Press Quit ShowyEdge button.

item.title: How to uninstall ShowyEdge
item.description: Remove ShowyEdge from your system as follows. Quit ShowyEdge before uninstallaion. Open Applications folder in Finder, then move ShowyEdge to trash.

item.title: Downgrade to older version
item.description: Download an older version from Release notes and install it.

item.title: Use beta version
item.description: You can install beta version from Update > Check for beta updates.
